title: One more reason to despise the UN
author: VD
content_html:
This little factoid might come in handy when dealing with the average pot-smoking Visualize World Peacenik:

In 1998 the UN General Assembly committed member countries to achieving a “drug-free world” and to “eliminating or significantly reducing” the production of opium, cocaine and cannabis by 2008. That is the kind of promise politicians love to make. It assuages the sense of moral panic that has been the handmaiden of prohibition for a century. It is intended to reassure the parents of teenagers across the world. Yet it is a hugely irresponsible promise, because it cannot be fulfilled.

Interesting to see the Economist come out in favor of legalization.
